metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7081 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The (old) Form Content Element component in TYPO3 4.5.0 through 4.5.31, 4.7.0 through 4.7.16, 6.0.0 through 6.0.11, and 6.1.0 through 6.1.6 allows remote authenticated editors to generate arbitrary HMAC signatures and bypass intended access restrictions via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7081` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.32+dfsg1-1').
